hangover.title: IV Hangover Relief
hangover.description: Revive and recover quickly from alcohol consumption. This therapy detoxifies your body, eliminates toxins, and effectively rehydrates, providing rapid relief from hangover symptoms.
ingredients: B-Complex Vitamins (B1, B2, B3, B5, B6)
benefits: Immediate relief from nausea and vomiting
Significant reduction in headache and body aches

dehydration.title: IV Dehydration Recovery
dehydration.description: Feel fresh and revitalized with rapid fluid replacement. Replenishes electrolytes, boosts energy, and improves your mood with this essential hydration therapy.
benefits: Improved cognitive function and mental clarity
Increased energy levels and physical alertness
Better mood regulation and emotional stability

foodPoisoning.title: IV Food Poisoning & Stomach Flu Recovery
foodPoisoning.description: Accelerate recovery from gastrointestinal distress. This therapy helps heal the stomach lining and is ideal for treating food poisoning and all gastrointestinal symptoms.
benefits: Rapid nausea and vomiting relief (within 20 minutes)
Stomach lining protection and accelerated healing
Complete restoration of lost fluids and nutrients
Enhanced digestive function and gut health
Improved immune response to fight infections

myers.title: IV Myers Cocktail
myers.description: The gold standard of IV therapy. This classic formula boosts red blood cell production, accelerates muscle recovery, improves sleep quality, and strengthens your immune system.
benefits: Improved energy metabolism and ATP production
Better sleep quality and REM cycle regulation
Reduced muscle fatigue and faster recovery
Increased red blood cell production and oxygen delivery
Support for chronic fatigue syndrome symptoms

energy.title: IV Energy Boost
energy.description: Combat fatigue and low energy with a scientifically formulated blend of IV fluids, electrolytes, vitamins, and antioxidants designed to revitalize your body at the cellular level.
benefits: Significant increase in energy levels (up to 8 hours)
Enhanced mental clarity and cognitive focus

muscle.title: IV Muscle Recovery
muscle.description: Optimize athletic performance and recovery. This therapy enhances muscle regeneration, reduces inflammation, and includes essential amino acids and nutrients for peak fitness.
benefits: Enhanced protein synthesis and muscle building
Improved athletic performance and power output
Faster recovery between intense training sessions

antiviral.title: IV Antiviral Defense
antiviral.description: Strengthen your body's natural defense against viral infections. This powerful formula uses high-dose vitamin C and zinc to target pathogens and enhance immune response.
benefits: Reduced viral replication and viral load
Powerful antioxidant protection against free radicals
Support for respiratory health and function

immune.title: IV Immune Shield
immune.description: Comprehensive immune system support with essential nutrients. This therapy strengthens your body's defenses, helping you recover from infections while promoting long-term wellness.
benefits: Faster recovery from colds, flu, and viruses

megaC.title: IV Megadose Vitamin C
megaC.description: High-dose vitamin C therapy for maximum immune support and detoxification. This treatment acts as a powerful antioxidant, promoting cellular repair and enhancing overall vitality.
benefits: Enhanced collagen synthesis for skin and joints
Anti-aging effects at the cellular level
Enhanced wound healing and tissue repair

detox.title: IV Full Body Detox
detox.description: Comprehensive cellular detoxification to eliminate harmful toxins. This therapy enhances liver function, boosts your immune system, and restores your body's natural balance.
benefits: Enhanced liver detoxification (Phase I & II pathways)
Elimination of free radicals and toxins
Better skin health and radiant appearance

heavyMetal.title: IV Heavy Metal Cleanse
heavyMetal.description: Specialized chelation therapy to remove heavy metals and environmental toxins. This treatment improves circulation, reduces inflammation, and supports overall health.
benefits: Removal of lead, mercury, cadmium, and arsenic

glutathione.title: IV Glutathione Glow
glutathione.description: Master antioxidant therapy for cellular detoxification and radiant skin. This treatment boosts immunity, reduces oxidative stress, and enhances your natural glow from within.
benefits: Skin lightening and brightening effects (visible in 3-5 sessions)
Reduced signs of aging and wrinkles

antiInflammatory.title: IV Anti-Inflammatory
antiInflammatory.description: Advanced inflammation reduction therapy combining turmeric, glutathione, and targeted nutrients to combat oxidative stress and support tissue repair for chronic and acute conditions.
benefits: Pain relief for chronic conditions (arthritis, fibromyalgia)
Reduced inflammatory markers throughout the body

jetLag.title: IV Jet Lag Reset
jetLag.description: Restore your natural circadian rhythm quickly and effectively. This specialized therapy contains melatonin, vitamins, and relaxants to help reset your sleep cycle after traveling.
benefits: Rapid sleep cycle adjustment (1-2 days vs 1 week)
Faster adaptation to new time zones
Better mood regulation and emotional balance

iron.title: IV Iron Recharge
iron.description: Combat iron deficiency anemia and chronic fatigue. This therapy safely boosts iron levels, enhances red blood cell production, and improves oxygen delivery throughout your body.

nad.title: IV NAD+ Revival
nad.description: Cutting-edge anti-aging therapy that provides cellular energy at the mitochondrial level. NAD+ supports DNA repair, metabolic regulation, and neurological function.
benefits: Improved cognitive function and mental clarity

rejuvenation.title: IV All-Inclusive Rejuvenation
rejuvenation.description: Comprehensive wellness therapy with a powerful blend of vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. This treatment promotes cellular regeneration, boosts collagen, and enhances overall vitality.
ingredients: Comprehensive multivitamin blend (A, D, E, K, B-complex)
benefits: Enhanced skin health and youthful appearance

rejuvenationExtra.title: IV All-Inclusive Rejuvenation (Extra Strength)
rejuvenationExtra.description: The ultimate wellness experience with maximum-dose nutrients. This premium therapy amplifies all rejuvenation benefits, maximizing hydration, cellular repair, and anti-aging effects.

serviceAreas.title: Service Areas & Travel
serviceAreas.subtitle: Mobile service throughout the metro area

travel.question: Is there an additional travel fee?
travel.answer: No, our pricing includes mobile service within our standard service area. For locations outside our service area, a small travel fee may apply.

insurance.question: Do you accept health insurance?
insurance.answer: Currently, we do not accept health insurance. However, you can use your HSA or FSA for payment. We provide detailed receipts for your records.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, cash, HSA/FSA cards, and mobile payment options like Apple Pay and Google Pay.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can reschedule or cancel your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time without any charges. Cancellations within 24 hours may incur a cancellation fee.

included.question: What's included in the price?
included.answer: All treatments include professional consultation, IV administration by licensed healthcare providers, medical-grade equipment, and post-treatment monitoring.

addons.question: How much do add-ons cost?
addons.answer: Add-on pricing varies based on the specific treatment and dosage requirements. We'll provide detailed pricing when you book your appointment or contact us for a consultation.

about.title: About IVIQ
about.subtitle: We're dedicated to revolutionizing healthcare by bringing premium IV therapy services directly to you, wherever you are.

story.title: Our Story
content: IVIQ was founded in 2023 with a simple yet powerful vision: to make high-quality IV therapy accessible, convenient, and personalized for everyone. Our founder, Dr. Sarah Johnson, recognized the growing need for preventative healthcare solutions that fit into modern busy lifestyles.

After years of working in emergency medicine, Dr. Johnson saw firsthand how IV therapy could dramatically improve patient outcomes. She realized that many people could benefit from IV therapy not just in emergency situations, but as part of their regular wellness routine.

Today, IVIQ serves hundreds of clients across the metro area, providing everything from hydration therapy to immune support, energy enhancement, and recovery treatments. We're proud to be at the forefront of the mobile healthcare revolution.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: To empower individuals to optimize their health and wellness through convenient, professional, and personalized IV therapy services delivered with compassion and excellence.

values.title: Safety First
values.description: We maintain the highest safety standards with licensed professionals and medical-grade equipment.

values.title: Patient-Centered Care

values.title: Convenience
values.description: We bring professional IV therapy to your location, saving you time and ensuring comfort.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We're committed to providing the highest quality IV therapy services with exceptional results.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our team of licensed healthcare professionals is dedicated to providing you with safe, effective, and personalized IV therapy treatments.

members.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
members.title: Medical Director & Founder
members.bio: Dr. Johnson brings over 15 years of emergency medicine experience to IVIQ. She founded the company with the vision of making high-quality IV therapy accessible and convenient for everyone. Her expertise in critical care and patient safety ensures the highest standards of treatment.

members.name: Michael Chen
members.title: Registered Nurse
members.bio: Michael specializes in critical care nursing and has extensive experience in IV therapy administration. He ensures every patient receives the highest standard of care with his gentle approach and attention to detail. His 8+ years in healthcare make him a trusted member of our team.

members.name: Lisa Rodriguez
members.title: Nurse Practitioner
members.bio: Lisa focuses on preventative care and wellness optimization. She works closely with clients to develop personalized treatment plans that support their health goals. Her holistic approach to healthcare and 10+ years of experience help clients achieve optimal wellness.

certifications.title: Certifications & Compliance
certifications.description: IVIQ maintains the highest standards of healthcare and regulatory compliance. We're committed to providing safe and effective treatments while protecting your privacy and health information.

benefitsPage.title: Benefits of IV Therapy
benefitsPage.subtitle: Discover why IV therapy is becoming the preferred method for delivering vitamins, minerals, and medications directly to your body.

keyBenefits.title: Key Benefits of IV Therapy
keyBenefits.subtitle: IV therapy offers numerous advantages over traditional oral supplements and medications.

items.title: 100% Absorption
items.description: IV therapy delivers nutrients directly to your bloodstream, ensuring 100% absorption compared to oral supplements which typically have only 20-50% absorption rates due to the digestive process.

items.title: Immediate Effects
items.description: Feel the benefits immediately as nutrients are delivered directly to your cells where they're needed most, rather than waiting hours or days for oral supplements to take effect.

items.title: Customized Treatment
items.description: Each IV formula can be tailored to address your specific health concerns and wellness goals, providing a personalized approach to your health and wellness.

items.title: Preventative Health
items.description: Regular IV therapy can help maintain optimal health and prevent deficiencies before they cause problems, supporting your body's natural defense systems.

items.title: Convenience
items.description: Our mobile service brings the benefits of IV therapy directly to your home, hotel, or office, saving you time and ensuring you can relax in a comfortable environment during treatment.

items.title: Professional Administration
items.description: All treatments are administered by licensed healthcare professionals who monitor your comfort and safety throughout the process.

howItWorks.title: How IV Therapy Works
description: IV therapy works by delivering nutrients directly to your bloodstream, bypassing the digestive system that can reduce the absorption of vitamins and minerals.
When nutrients are delivered intravenously, your body can absorb 100% of what it needs, compared to as little as 20% absorption from oral supplements.
This direct delivery method allows higher doses of nutrients to be administered safely and effectively, providing immediate benefits and therapeutic effects that oral supplements simply cannot match.

steps.title: Direct Delivery
steps.description: Nutrients enter your bloodstream directly, bypassing the digestive system.

steps.title: Complete Absorption
steps.description: Your body absorbs 100% of the vitamins and minerals administered.

steps.title: Immediate Effect
steps.description: Benefits are felt quickly as nutrients are immediately available to your cells.

conditions.title: Conditions That Benefit from IV Therapy
conditions.subtitle: IV therapy can help with a wide range of health concerns and wellness goals.

items.title: Dehydration
benefits: Relief from symptoms like headache and fatigue

safety.title: Safety and Professional Care
safety.description: At IVIQ, your safety is our top priority. All of our IV therapy treatments are:
items: Customized based on your health history and needs
Prepared using sterile techniques and medical-grade equipment
Compliant with all health and safety regulations
safety.note: We follow strict protocols to ensure your treatment is both safe and effective. Our team is trained in emergency procedures and carries all necessary medical equipment.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using IVIQ's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: IVIQ provides mobile IV therapy services administered by licensed healthcare professionals. Our services include various IV therapy treatments designed to support health and wellness. All treatments are provided for wellness purposes and are not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

eligibility.title: 3. Eligibility and Medical Clearance
eligibility.content: You must be 18 years of age or older to receive our services. You must provide accurate medical information and disclose any allergies, medical conditions, or medications. IVIQ reserves the right to refuse service if we determine it may not be safe or appropriate for you.

consent.title: 4. Informed Consent
consent.content: By booking our services, you acknowledge that you understand the nature of IV therapy, its potential benefits and risks, and you consent to treatment. You understand that no guarantee of specific results has been made.

payment.title: 5. Payment and Cancellation
payment.content: Payment is due at the time of service. We accept cash, credit cards, and HSA/FSA cards. Cancellations must be made at least 24 hours in advance to avoid cancellation fees. Same-day cancellations may incur a fee equal to 50% of the service cost.

liability.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: IVIQ's liability is limited to the cost of the service provided. We maintain professional liability insurance and follow all applicable health and safety regulations. You acknowledge that IV therapy, like any medical procedure, carries inherent risks.

privacy.title: 7. Privacy and Confidentiality
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy and maintaining the confidentiality of your health information in accordance with HIPAA regulations. Your personal and medical information will not be shared without your consent except as required by law.

modifications.title: 8. Modifications to Terms
modifications.content: IVIQ reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our website. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of any modifications.
